explains: v. <正式>唤醒，（使）醒来；激励，（使）振奋；激起（某种情感）；激怒，使激动；使（某事物）发生，引起；搅动（液体，尤指酿制中的啤酒）
wordGroup: rouse oneself 奋起；振作精神

sentences.en: He did more to rouse the crowd there than anybody else.
sentences.cn: 他比其他任何人都更卖力地鼓动那里的群众。

sentences.en: She seemed to be unable to rouse herself to do anything.
sentences.cn: 她似乎打不起精神做任何事情。

sentences.en: He had slumped into a state of torpor from which nothing could rouse him.
sentences.cn: 他陷入了一种麻木状态，什么事都不能唤起他的兴趣。
